title: kanja malaraDi
sahitya:
kanja malaraDi tanjam aDaindEn kaN pArttaruL aiyA meyyAga nin


anupallavi

  anjana vaNNA ambuja kaNNA accutAnanda gOvindA mukundA nin


caraNam    vandANDaruL anbar cintAmaNE anandA murArE parandAmanE
brndAvana carAra vindAnanA nandAtmaja emai puram tAL rukmiNI manOhara nin
